error404.errorMessage: Oops, you've landed on a secret page that doesn't exist! The page may have been deleted or moved. Go to our main page to find the information you need.

error505.errorMessage: Oops… Something went wrong with our server. The technical team is already working on a solution to the problem. For now, please return to the main page

hero.heroText: Become part of a dynamic community that will support your growth, provide a wide range of opportunities for development and reveal your professional potential. We promise, we will exceed your expectations!

faqs.question: How to register and start using JunChirp?
faqs.answer: To register for JunChirp, click the `SIGN UP` button on the main page. Fill in the required fields, confirm your e-mail and get access to all the features of the platform.
